question: Which among the following was the purpose of setting up the Balwant Rai Mehta Committee in 1956?
option2: Reporting the working of the Village Panchayats
option3: Suggesting measures for better efficiency in the implementation of the Community Development Projects
option4: Investigating the feasibility of setting up new Panchayat Machinery
answer: Suggesting measures for better efficiency in the implementation of the Community Development Projects
explanation: Balwant Rai Mehta Committee was setup in 1956 to Suggest the measures for better efficiency in the implementation of the Community Development Projects.
